stylesheet: TituloJanela { color: darkgreen; } BotaoPadrao { color: darkgreen; background-color: #18C5A8; border-style: outset; border-radius: 45px; border-width: 3px; border-color: #14AE12; padding: 3px; } BotaoPadrao:hover { background-color: #2CD9BC; border-color: #28C226; } BotaoPadrao:pressed { background-color: #007B61; border-color: #009A00; } InputJogador { color: darkgreen; background-color: #18C5A8; border-radius: 12px; } ScrollableLeaderboard { color: darkgreen; background-color: #18C5A8; border-style: outset; border-radius: 20px; border-width: 5px; border-color: #14AE12; } ScrollableLeaderboard:hover { color: darkgreen; background-color: #18C5A8 }
